New Records: Zach LaVine's streak of 30-point games hits a career-high 5
Key Match Events: Nikola Vučević racked up another double-double
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls are never going to complain about a Friday night win at the United Center
The Bulls (18-20) are two games ahead of the Philadelphia 76ers (15-21) for the final play-in spot in the East
Others: The Bulls recorded 39 assists on 53 baskets in the win
Zach LaVine averaged 23.3 points on 51.4% shooting from the floor and 44.4% from 3-point range
